result.execSummary:
The defendant Marie H Kunde was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Jail (Straight Time)
Consecutive to: Waukesha County Case #14CF749.
03/30/2015 PER REQUEST FROM DOC, SENTENCE AMENDED TO 2 YEARS PROBATION.

miscConds.notes:
DNA Sample WAIVED.

Cost and Surcharge to be paid as a Condition of Probation at the rate of $200.00 per month starting 05-01-2015 and/or 1015 hours of Community Service to be completed by completion of Probation. Court must receive notice of completion prior to 03-17-2019.

If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.
AODA Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended.

Maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
Submit Random Blood Urine Screens.
No use or possession of alcohol or illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia.
No use or possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription.
Any valid prescription drugs must be taken in the manner in which they are prescribed.
Inform Agent of all prescriptions.
Sign any/all Medical Releases for Agent.
Be involved in a12 step program at least 2 times per week within 30 days and obtain a sponsor/mentor within 60 days.
Operate a motor vehicle with a valid driver's license.
No Violent contact with Michael K.
DNA Sample WAIVED.

timeConds.notes: Each year of Probation with the final 20 hours to be completed within the First 10 months of the Last year.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Marie H Kunde
